title: 5-15-17  Erin Davis, Cecile McPeak, Sandi Hazlewood, & Roseann Kermes on Pat Sloan's Talk show for American Patchwork and Quilting Radio
description:
Many times I am introduced to a quilter’s work via a project they have shared that I run across. With Erin Davis of ‘Sew at home mummy’ that is the case. I love Mid Century Modern design and I ended up finding her articles about her love of that style, and finding out she quilts and does super great design!
www.sewathomemummy.com
-------------'
The quilting industry is full of successful family businesses, and today we’ll meet one of the owners behind the adorable ‘Just Another Button Company’ Cecile McPeak who is the founder & creative director. She now run the company with her daughter Rachel Martin. They make buttons not only useful, but decorative & fun!
www.JustAnotherButtonCompany.com
--------------
I’m happy to chat podcasts today with Sandi Hazlewood, the creator of Crafty Planner sewing and quilting podcast!
http://www.craftyplanner.com/ 
--------------
Roseann Kermes of Rosebud's cottage is back and we are talking about how to clean those most used tools. Have you ever thought about that? Me either!  AND we'll talk about her darling book.. it's so cute!
http://www.rosebudscottage.typepad.com/
================
visit American Patchwork & Quilting at http://allpeoplequilt.com
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/apqmagazine
Visit host Pat Sloan at http://www.patsloan.com
